CHANGE LOG
==========

## 1.4.0 (2016-02-05)
 - Upstream changes to symfony/polyfill

## 1.3.0 (2016-01-23)
 - INF

## 1.2.0 (2016-01-03)
 - gzopen(), etc. are now part of symfony/polyfill

## 1.1.0 (2015-12-21)
 - add jakeasmith/http_build_url

## 1.0.0 (2015-12-18)
 - Disable bug_compat_42
 - Undo the effects of get_magic_quotes_gpc()
 - http_response_code()
 - gzopen()
 - gzseek()
 - gztell()
